src:
Jobbsiffror lyfte Wall Street till rekordnivåer – Apple bland vinnarna
De starka amerikanska jobbsiffrorna lyfte Wall Street till nya rekordnivåer. S&P 500 steg 1 procent och stängde fredagshandeln på nytt all time high. Bland bolagen rusade Fitbit 15,2 procent efter Google-uppköpet.
01 Nov 2019, 20:01 by Victor Hultgren

text:
Job numbers lifted Wall Street to record levels - Apple among the winners
The strong US job numbers lifted Wall Street to new record levels. The S&P 500 rose 1 percent and closed Friday trading again all time high. Among the companies, Fitbit rushed 15.2 percent after the Google acquisition.
01 Nov 2019, 20:01 by Victor Hultgren
